mapper.select: select a.todoid, a.employeeid, a.subject, a.registrationdate, a.status from todos a inner join todomember b on a.todoid=b.tid where b.eid=#{param1}
select todoid, employeeid, subject, registrationdate, status from todos where todoid=#{param1}
select max(todoid) from todos where employeeid=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into todos set employeeid=#{param1}, subject=#{param2}
insert into todomember set tid=#{param1}, eid=#{param2}
